channel.title: Radio Free KODT - www.kenzerco.com (mp3)
channel.itunes:author: Jolly R Blackburn
channel.description: The podcast version of the cult favorite comic book, Knights of the Dinner Table is brought to life via the magic of podcasting. Listen to all of your favorite strips from the comics 10+ year run. The podcasts will also feature commentaries by the members of the D-Team. Kenzer and Company is best known for the Knights of the Dinner Table comic book as well as the many games they make including the HackMaster rpg.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The podcast version of the cult favorite comic book, Knights of the Dinner Table
channel.itunes:summary: The cult comic book Knights of the Dinner Table is brought to life via the magic of podcasting. Listen in to all of your favorite strips from the comics 10+ year run. channel.itunes:link: Radio Free KODT" rel="image" type="video/jpeg">Radio Free KODT

item.title: RFKODT Episode 0.75 - RFKODT: KODT LIVE READING: GENCON 2005 Part 1 (35 mins) - www.kenzerco.com (iTunes)
item.description: Out-takes from the ever popular (and sold out) Knights of the Dinner Table Live Reading which took place August 30th in Indianapolis at GENCON 2005. Voice Credits: Too many to list. Narrator: Jolly R. Blackburn, Brian Jelke and David S. Kenzer. Strips: Various strips taken mostly from BOT 1 and BOT 2. Kenzer and Company is best known for the Knights of the Dinner Table comic book as well as the many games they make including the HackMaster rpg.
item.itunes:subtitle: GENCON 2005
item.author: radiofreekodt@kenzerco.com
item.itunes:author: radiofreekodt@kenzerco.com (RFKODT)
item.itunes:keywords: rpg roleplaying games gaming knights of the dinner table comics rpgs games gaming role playing

item.title: RFKODT Blooper Reel 1 - REVISION #002 - www.kenzerco.com
item.description: This is a VERY informal TEST mp3 we decided to put up to make sure our feeds work prior to the launch of Radio Free KODT next week. Just some out takes and bloopers we put together to make sure there are no technical difficulties. Kenzer and Company is best known for the Knights of the Dinner Table comic book as well as the many games they make including the HackMaster rpg.
